content: Every Jeanne Sager Photography session is customized to your needs, whether I come to you or you travel to my studio in Callicoon Center, New York. In addition to bringing my 20+ years experience in photography, I offer wardrobe and location consulting, as well as packages that can be built around your budget.
footer: Don't see your photography needs listed or still have questions?
Contact Jeanne Sager Photography now, so we can start building a photography session package that works for you!

sections.name: Weddings and Engagement Photography
sections.copy: Jeanne Sager Photography wedding packages are custom built based on time, location, and more. Digital photo gallery delivery is guaranteed within one month of your special day, and print packages are available. Engagement sessions booked in conjunction with a wedding are provided at a 25% discount (they can also be booked separately!). Jeanne Sager Photography believes that love is love is love. We are an LGBTQIA-friendly business. Set up your complimentary consultation session so we can build your custom package!

sections.name: Family Photography Sessions
sections.copy: My family sessions can be booked at a location of your choice or at my studio in Callicoon Center, depending on whether you prefer a lifestyle approach or a more traditional portrait session. Pricing options:

packages.name: Package A
list: Two-hour session at a location of your choice (ask me for suggested spots!)
40+ high resolution downloadable digital images
Wardrobe consultation
Variety of poses, including different family groupings (e.g. parents alone, parents with kids, kids alone, grandparents with grandchildren, etc.)
Investment: $600 with tax included

packages.name: Package B
list: Two-hour session at a location of your choice (ask me for suggested spots!)
20 high resolution downloadable digital images (additional digitals and prints available for purchase)
Wardrobe consultation
Variety of poses, including different family groupings (e.g. parents alone, parents with kids, kids alone, grandparents with grandchildren, etc.)
Investment: $450 sitting fee with tax included

packages.name: Package C
list: One-hour session at a location of your choice (ask me for suggested spots!)
Wardrobe consultation
Variety of poses, including different family groupings (e.g. parents alone, parents with kids, kids alone, grandparents with grandchildren, etc.)
Gallery of 20 high resolution digital images to choose from. Buy only those you want!
Investment: $300 sitting fee with tax included (plus cost of individual digitals)

packages.name: Package A -- Child Wonder
packages.copy: Ever wonder what the world looks like through your child's eyes? Answer the question with a child wonder session!
list: Just me, a camera, and your child/children in their natural environment (your home, a local park, or other spot of your choosing)
5 high resolution downloadable digital images (additional digitals and prints available for purchase)
Investment: $300 with tax included (Book Family Session Package A or B, and get $100 off a Child Wonder Session!!)

packages.name: Package B -- In Studio Child Sessions
packages.copy: Cake smashes, sitter sessions and more are available at my studio in Callicoon Center.
list: One-hour session in my studio
Discounts available for smash cakes from Divine Sweets by K&H!
10 high resolution downloadable digital images (additional digitals and prints available for purchase)
Investment: $400 with tax included

packages.name: Package A
list: Two-hour session at a location of your choice (ask me for suggested spots!)
20 high resolution downloadable digital images (additional digitals and prints available for purchase)

Variety of poses, including couple together, mom alone, etc.
Investment: $450 sitting fee, tax included
